hero.label: Consulting
hero.title: Setting direction, making choices, ensuring change lands
hero.subtitle: Pragmatic, collaborative, and focused on results that last.
hero.description: Transformations rarely fail because of technology. They fail due to unclear direction, inadequate governance, or lack of buy-in. We help you make the right choices and ensure change actually lands.

intro.title: What we do
intro.text: Consulting at Best Practice Company isn't advice from a distance. We work alongside you. We think along in the boardroom and on the work floor. Our consultants combine strategic insight with operational experience – they know how large organizations work and where change gets stuck.
intro.focus: AI is often the accelerator. Our core is transformation that lands: governance, decision-making, adoption and execution. That's where we make the difference.

principles.title: Five principles that guide everything
principles.intro: These principles apply to every type of engagement. They are non-negotiable.

items.title: Results first
items.description: We start with what you want to achieve, not with technology or tooling. Every solution begins with a clear business case.
items.why: Prevents solutions looking for a problem

items.title: Measure what matters
items.description: Baseline before we start, measurement moments after. Always. So you can demonstrate value to your stakeholders.
items.why: Without measurement, no proof of value

items.title: Human in control
items.description: Technology supports, people decide. Transparent systems that explain what they do and why.

items.title: Governance built in
items.description: Compliance, privacy, traceability – these are basic requirements. Built in from day one, not added afterwards.
items.why: Prevents fixing things after the fact

items.title: No unnecessary dependency
items.description: Custom work we build for you is yours – including documentation and training. Our own tools and solutions you can use as a service.
items.why: Clear distinction between your property and our products

careers_page.title: Work at Best Practice Company
careers_page.meta_description: Help build transformation that works. Senior positions for people who prefer building over presenting.

hero.title: Help build transformation that works
hero.subtitle: With AI and technology as accelerators.
hero.intro: You've seen it before. Months of work. Beautiful presentations. And then... nothing. It stalls in the organization. Decisions get delayed. People disengage. The project gets 'parked'.
hero.promise: At Best Practice Company, we build until it works. Not until the deadline. Not until the budget runs out. Until it works.

how_we_work.title: Results you can see
how_we_work.intro: We work on transformation that lands in operations. AI and technology are accelerators toward concrete impact.

points.title: Small, senior teams
points.description: Direct lines. You work with the people who decide and build.

points.title: To production and beyond
points.description: What we build gets used. Daily. By real people in real organizations.

points.title: Within existing IT landscapes
points.description: SAP, ServiceNow, Microsoft Dynamics – we know enterprise IT. We build on what's already there.

points.title: Lasting involvement
points.description: After go-live is when it really starts. We stay involved until adoption works and results are demonstrable.

reality_check.title: Honest and pragmatic
reality_check.text: Moving fast, adjusting where needed, and pragmatically dealing with changing technology. That's how we work.

who_fits.title: Does this sound like you?
who_fits.intro: We're looking for people who want to make an impact. Next month, not in two years.

story.paragraph1: You have years of experience in complex organizations. You understand how processes and technology interact — and why they often clash. You feel responsible for the end result, not just your piece.
story.paragraph2: You're comfortable in environments where you decide how you work. Where decisions are made quickly. Where you engage with executives and the shop floor, depending on what's needed.
story.paragraph3: This is a place for people who take ownership. Who value results over process. Who build and advise.

who_fits.closing: We're looking for people who prefer building over presenting. And solving over explaining.

vacancies.title: Where we're hiring
vacancies.intro: Clients are asking us for more capacity. These roles support our story of transformation and execution.

roles.title: AI Delivery Lead
roles.why_visible: This is proof that we build to production and beyond.
roles.description: As AI Delivery Lead, you're responsible for delivering AI solutions that actually go into production and get used. You oversee the whole, provide substantive direction, and contribute hands-on where needed.
responsibilities: Lead AI Delivery Sprints from decision to production
Work with business, IT and compliance
requirements: Experience with AI solutions in production
roles.why_bpc: You don't build something 'for later'. You make it work. Now.

roles.title: Transformation Manager
roles.why_visible: Change that actually lands in the organization.
roles.description: As Transformation Manager, you ensure changes actually get executed. You connect strategy, operations and technology into one working whole.
responsibilities: Keep progress, decision-making and ownership sharp
Work closely with AI Delivery and client teams
Ensure changes land in the organization
requirements: Experience with organizational change in complex environments
roles.why_bpc: Technology only creates value when people move with it.

roles.title: Senior AI Consultant
roles.why_visible: The bridge between business need and technical solution.
roles.description: You work on AI solutions that directly connect to client processes and systems. Solutions that people use daily.
responsibilities: Think along about use cases and feasibility
Collaborate with delivery and transformation teams
roles.why_bpc: What you build gets used. Every day.

roles.title: Operational Excellence Specialist
roles.why_visible: AI only works if the process underneath is right.
roles.description: You help organizations improve their processes and prepare them for smart technology. You look at how work flows first, then at tooling.
requirements: Experience in operations, finance, supply chain, HR or manufacturing
Focus on improvement you can measure
roles.why_bpc: You prepare organizations for AI that works.
